languages.text: Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.
languages.original_text: Убив цель, отмеченную как {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g}, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} добычи</u>% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>(prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

languages.text: 每当装备者击杀被标记{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}的目标时，造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高<u>猎物的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者击杀被标记{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}的目标时，造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高<u>猎物的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}として指定されたターゲットをキルするたびに、戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に+<u>獲物の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}難易度レベル{/g}</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

traits.locale_text: 着用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}として指定されたターゲットを殺すたびに、戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に＋<u>（獲物の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}難易度レベル{/g}）</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。この効果はスタックできる。

languages.text: Cuando el portador mata a un enemigo marcado como {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g}, gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} del +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} de la presa)</u> % al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} hasta que termine el combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador mata a un enemigo marcado como {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g}, gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} del +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} de la presa)</u> % al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} hasta que termine el combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger ein Ziel als {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} markiert, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen +<u>Beute-{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g}</u> %-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Dieser Effekt ist stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger ein als {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} markiertes Ziel tötet, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} der Beute</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Dieser Effekt ist stapelbar.

Wenn der Träger ein Ziel als {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} markiert, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen +<u>(Beute-{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g})</u> %-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Dieser Effekt ist stapelbar.

languages.text: Убив цель, отмеченную как {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g}, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} добычи</u>% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

traits.locale_text: Убив цель, отмеченную как {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g}, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} добычи</u>% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

Убив цель, отмеченную как {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g}, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} цели)</u>% к наносимому урону до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

Убив цель, отмеченную как {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g}, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} добычи</u>% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur élimine une cible désignée comme {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proie{/g}, il obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté de la proie{/g}</u> % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cet effet est cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur élimine une cible désignée comme une {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proie{/g}, il obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté de la proie{/g})</u> % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cet effet est cumulable.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, her {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}av{/g} olarak işaretlenmiş hedefi öldürdüğünde vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} +%<u>avın {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}zorluk derecesi{/g}</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazanır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.
